patterns: How do you handle my data?
responses: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. Here are the key points:
- We collect account info, device data, irrigation system data, and usage statistics
- We use this data to provide, maintain and improve our services
- We implement strong security measures to protect your information
- We may update this policy and will notify you of changes
You can read the full policy on our Privacy Policy page.
We collect several types of information to provide better services:
- Account information (username, email address)
- Device information (IP address, device type)
- Irrigation system data (sensor readings, control commands)
- Usage data (how you interact with our system)

patterns: What do you do with my information?
responses: We use your information to:
- Provide, maintain, and improve our services
- Develop new features and functionality
- Monitor system performance and security
- Communicate with you about your account
We implement appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website.

patterns: Who can I contact about privacy?
responses: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please visit our Contact Page.
If you want to know more about us, please visit our About Page.
Please contact us through our Contact Page to discuss data deletion options and account management.

patterns: Who has access to my information?
responses: We do not sell your personal data. We only share information as necessary to provide our services, maintain security, or comply with legal obligations. For specific details, please refer to our full Privacy Policy.

patterns: Do I have to accept the privacy policy?
responses: Yes, by using our Intelligent Irrigation System, you agree to our Privacy Policy and how we handle your data as described therein.
